GitHub Actions Status Badges
=============================

Add these badges to your README.md to display workflow status:

CI Pipeline:
[![CI Pipeline](https://github.com/czlonkowski/n8n-mcp/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/czlonkowski/n8n-mcp/actions/workflows/ci.yml)

Comprehensive Testing:
[![Comprehensive Testing](https://github.com/czlonkowski/n8n-mcp/actions/workflows/test.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/czlonkowski/n8n-mcp/actions/workflows/test.yml)

Build Validation:
[![Build Validation](https://github.com/czlonkowski/n8n-mcp/actions/workflows/build.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/czlonkowski/n8n-mcp/actions/workflows/build.yml)

Codecov (if enabled):
[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/czlonkowski/n8n-mcp/branch/main/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/czlonkowski/n8n-mcp)

All-in-one status section for README:
======================================

## Build Status
